statements: UPDATE CourseMaterials SET instructor='Professor Smith', material_url='https://example.com/materials' WHERE course_id=101
UPDATE CourseMaterials SET course_name='Data Science', instructor='Dr. Johnson' WHERE course_id=201
UPDATE CourseMaterials SET instructor='John Doe', material_url='www.example.com/material1' WHERE course_id=1;
UPDATE CourseMaterials SET material_url='www.example.com/material2', instructor='Jane Smith' WHERE course_id=2;
UPDATE course_materials SET instructor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE resources SET resource_name = 'Database Design Basics', resource_link = 'https://example.com/database-design' WHERE resource_id = 201;
UPDATE course_materials SET material_url = 'http://example.com/video' WHERE course_id = 101
UPDATE resources SET resource_type = 'Presentation', resource_link = 'http://example.com/presentation' WHERE resource_id = 202
UPDATE courses SET course_name='Mathematics' WHERE course_id=1;
UPDATE resources SET resource_type='PDF', resource_name='Algebra PDF' WHERE resource_id=2;
UPDATE courses SET course_name = 'Advanced Java Programming', course_description = 'In-depth study of Java programming concepts' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE resources SET resource_name = 'Java Programming Resources', resource_link = 'https://www.javatutorial.com' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE course_materials SET material_name = 'Introduction to SQL' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET start_date = '2022-10-01' WHERE course_id = 3;
UPDATE course_materials SET material_name = 'New Material', material_type = 'Video' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE resources SET description = 'Updated Description', link = 'https://example.com/new_link' WHERE resource_id = 3;
UPDATE course_materials SET material_name = 'Updated Lecture Notes' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE resources SET course_id = 2, file_url = 'https://example.com/course/2/resources' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE course_materials SET material_name = 'Updated Material 1', material_type = 'Video' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE resources SET resource_name = 'New Resource Name', file_url = 'https://example.com/file.pdf' WHERE course_id = 2;
